Articles.Content: I was thinking of a good feature we could see in either KSP 1.11 or KSP 2. I would like to see parachutes have an overhaul. This could include (but is not limited to): Soft Body Physics (i know this is hard in unity); Small Small chance of them not deploying correctly (like 1 in a million); Parachutes could be able to catch fire from engine plumes; if they collide with something it could have an aerodynamic effect; if they collide with something they could actually collide and not go through. The soft body physics would be a GAME changer as it would allow many possibilities AND add to the realism
soft body physics seems a bit too much
